component.name: GoTalk Dictation
component.summary: System-wide speech-to-text dictation with global hotkeys

description.p: GoTalk Dictation is a lightweight, system-wide speech-to-text tool for Linux that types spoken words into any application using global hotkeys.

ul.li: Global toggle hotkey (default: Alt+D) — press once to start, again to stop
Push-to-talk hotkey — hold to record, release to transcribe
Undo hotkey to remove last dictated text
Voice Activity Detection — auto-stops on silence
Two API modes: free Google endpoint and Google Cloud Speech API
Visual overlay showing recording state and transcript preview
System tray icon with settings window

description.p: Initial release with toggle and push-to-talk hotkeys, VAD, 25 languages, Flatpak support, and system tray UI.
